long_bio: I’m currently working as a full-stack Android Apps 📱 developer and have experience in full-stack Web 🌐 development. I’m an open-source enthusiast and a die-hard Linux 🐧 fan. I love to solve challenging problems, working with new technologies, and learn new things. Alhamdulillah, I’m a quick learner and good at finding bugs 🐞. Coding is my passion and hobby. My rule is to maintain all coding conventions and write self-descriptive codes. Finally, I’m friendly, team-oriented, and awesome 😎.

achievements.title: Programming Contest Participant
achievements.description: Represented IIUC in ― ACM ICPC Programming Contest 2015 - Dhaka regional as team "IIUC_traitorz".

achievements.title: ICT Tutor
achievements.about: The base of Interactive ICT project.
achievements.description: Project Leader and developed with “Team Shunno”, which was awarded 1st Runner-up in “EATL Prothom-Alo App contest - 2016”.

achievements.title: Volunteer Management
achievements.about: A platform for volunteers to maintain their groups and quickly get help on disasters.
achievements.description: Developed with “Team Shunno”, build for disaster management category for SS12 Project Competition 2017 organized by IEEE BDS HAC.

achievements.title: Bangladesh Travel Magazine
achievements.about: A social-networking web platform for Bangladeshi travelers. The web app can suggest users where to go on a specific season based on historical data.
achievements.description: Developed with “Team Shunno”, which presented in SUST Hackathon 2017.

achievements.title: Shunno Community
achievements.about: A full-featured question-answer platform for students, created for Interactive ICT.
achievements.description: Was Project Leader and developed it with “Team Shunno”.

achievements.title: Interactive ICT
achievements.about: An interactive learning app and an alternative to Computers for Inter Students. It has a full-featured HTML Editor, C Compiler, SQL Simulator, and Encryption Simulator. Its unique and powerful dynamic-solution feature can give step by step solution of 18 types of number-system related math problems.
achievements.description: Was Project Leader and developed it with “Team Shunno”, which was presented in App Development Competition at IUT 9th ICT Fest 2017, and “Team Shunno” was selected as the Champion. It was downloaded over 5k from the Google Play store.

achievements.title: Education Management System
achievements.about: A full-featured Education Management System for School. It has stuff-teacher-student management, attendance, automated result generation, automated promotion with roll distribution, SMS, advanced search, report generation with print etc.
achievements.description: Developed with “Team Shunno” for KDA IT. My part was designing the front-end and automate the marking, result generation, and roll generation.

achievements.title: BRG Food Delivery
achievements.about: BRG Food Delivery is a food delivery app for Barcode Restaurant Group.
achievements.description: Developed for Octoriz Pvt. Ltd. I designed the layouts, connect the app with the server APIs, implemented a secure token authentication system, and authentication-related features for the App.

achievements.title: Locafie
achievements.about: Locafie is a community-driven school/university bus location sharing-tracking app. Any volunteer from a bus can share real-time bus location and others can track the bus in real-time.
achievements.description: Developed for Octoriz Pvt. Ltd. I’m the lead developer of this project. It is a server-less real-time vehicle location sharing-tracking app, build with the firestore database, cloud functions, and Google Maps APIs.

achievements.title: MGWPR
achievements.description: Developed for Madina Group, from Dream71 Bangladesh Ltd. My notable tasks are — multiple attachments upload feature for issue submit and comments, UI redesign, etc.

achievements.title: Multimedia Classroom Monitoring System
achievements.about: The project is for monitoring the status of the multimedia classrooms & classes. The app is also used for school/college visit reporting, daily performance reports, and notices for education officers and teachers, etc.
achievements.description: Developed for a2i, from Dream71 Bangladesh Ltd. Android app for stage 2 of the project developed by me. Notable tasks are — chatting module using socket.io, offline submission for failed submissions (implemented by Work-manager), etc. This app has two versions for DSHE & DPE, separated by the build variant.

achievements.title: Parliament
achievements.description: Developed for Bangladesh Parliament from Dream71 Bangladesh Ltd.

achievements.title: Net Metering Appraisal Study
achievements.about: A survey and reporting app for solar systems & solar parks.
achievements.description: Developed for SREDA and UNDP, from Dream71 Bangladesh Ltd. The android app is developed by me. Notable tasks — dynamic, long & complex form design, etc.

achievements.title: Foot Soldier Tracker
achievements.about: Foot Soldier Tracker is used to track the field staff. Field staff can give attendance and sell SIMs & packages from the app.
achievements.description: Developed for Windmill Advantage, from Dream71 Bangladesh Ltd. I’m the lead developer of this project. My notable tasks are — real-time location tracking (foreground and background), full app offline mode, offline submission, and auto resend later if the internet available, etc.

achievements.title: Library: Oops! No Internet!
achievements.about: Oops! No Internet! No internet dialog and snackbar for the rescue!
achievements.description: A simple no Internet dialog and snackbar, which will automatically appear and disappear based on Internet connectivity status.

achievements.title: Library: Why Not! Image Carousel!
achievements.about: Why Not use Image Carousel if you have lots of images to show!
achievements.description: An easy, super simple, and customizable image carousel view for Android.

achievements.title: Confidence MIS
achievements.about: A full-featured issue tracker and management information system.
achievements.description: Developed for Confidence Group, from Dream71 Bangladesh Ltd. My notable tasks are — dynamic forms, complex view for reporting, user-friendly UI designs, etc.

achievements.title: Jolzatra
achievements.description: Developed for Jolzatra Ltd., from Dream71 Bangladesh Ltd. The android app is developed by me. The app is used for both customers and merchants. Notable tasks are — craft the UI, scan & ticket printing using Sunmi V2 POS device, complex seat layout & cart system design and implementation, SSLCOMMERZ payment gateway implementation, etc.
